remarks: Implicit substitution of classes for ordered pairs.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-1995.)
statement:
2optocl.1 $e |- R = ( C X. D ) $.
2optocl.2 $e |- ( <. x , y >. = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
2optocl.3 $e |- ( <. z , w >. = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
2optocl.4 $e |- ( ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) /\ ( z e. C /\ w e. D ) ) -> ph ) $.
2optocl $p |- ( ( A e. R /\ B e. R ) -> ch ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B w z $.
$d C w x y z $.
$d D w x y z $.
$d R w z $.
$d ch w z $.
$d ps x y $.
